const response = await client.index({
  index: "my-index-000001",
  id: 1,
  refresh: "true",
  document: {
    "user.id": "kimchy",
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.count({
  index: "my-index-000001",
  q: "user:kimchy",
});
console.log(response1);

const response2 = await client.count({
  index: "my-index-000001",
  query: {
    term: {
      "user.id": "kimchy",
    },
  },
});
console.log(response2);
